snippet.title: Guinea Pig Parkour Teaser Trailer (Steam Wishlist Trailer)
snippet.description:
Kickstarter coming soon!  Follow here to get notified as soon as it launches: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/JoeGP/guinea-pig-parkour

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1383660/Guinea_Pig_Parkour/

Guinea Pig Parkour is a completely hand-drawn 2D platformer with adventure elements, drawing heavy inspiration from '90s animated cartoons and games. It is animated and developed completely by one artist, Jeff Mumm, and features music and SFX by Fat Bard.

Run, jump, swing, flip, vault, climb, crawl, and parkour through classic platformer inspired levels. Talk to, interact with, help, and annoy a host of funny characters as you progress through a "lost '90s cartoon episode."

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATIVE COMMONS ATTRIBUTION:
ANFX // Free Media!: Blank VHS Tape with Play Overlay Footage 
--
Christopher Huppertz: VHS Glitch - Stock Footage
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
--
RIVER RIVERNET: REAL VHS FF ( Fast Forward ) Effect / Glitch
Mr fx: VHS SOUND EFFECTS
ROCKETSTOCK: AE VHS Assets
--
Abacagi: TV Static SFX
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
--
Fantasia Fantasia by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3737-fantasia-fantasia
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
--
jodybruchon: Voices - male laughter - goofy and forced
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
